summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the execution of an agreement with the Office of Community Oriented Policing Services, United States Department of Justice for financial assistance through the Advancing Community Policing Program to enhance the Police Department's internal community policing efforts while providing resources to disseminate information about these activities to other agencies; accepting the money when received; increasing the 1998 Budget of the Police Department by making a reimbursable appropriation; and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
